name: agent_delegate
description: Delegate a task to another specialized agent. Use this when you need expertise from a different domain (e.g., Sales Agent needs Data Agent to run queries, or Workflow Agent needs Design Agent to generate images). This enables multi-agent collaboration where each agent brings specialized capabilities.

target_agent.description: The agent to delegate to. Choose based on capabilities: 'sales' for revenue/customer analysis, 'data' for database queries/analytics, 'design' for images/UI, 'workflow' for task/process management, 'document' for text editing, 'analytics' for metrics/KPIs, 'marketing' for campaigns, 'finance' for budgets, 'concierge' for general coordination.

task.description: Clear description of the task to delegate. Be specific about what you need the other agent to do. Example: 'Query the sales database for Q4 revenue breakdown by product category and return the top 5 products'

context.description: Additional context the target agent needs. Include relevant data from your current task, user intent, component details, etc.

original_user_intent.description: The original user's intent that started this workflow

component_id.description: The component that initiated the workflow

data.description: Any relevant data the target agent needs

mode.description: Execution mode: 'single' for one agent (default), 'sequential' for multiple agents in order, 'parallel' for simultaneous execution

wait_for_result.description: Whether to wait for the delegated agent's result before continuing. Set to true if you need their output to complete your task.
